name: The Flamecaller's Stone
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration like a god.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
The Flamecaller's Stone is an artifact of Kirvana.
The Flamecaller's Stone makes it possible to 'conjure campfires'.
The Flamecaller's Stone prevents the wearer from being lit on fire.
